import React, {useState} from "react"; import {ToDoTasksTable} from '../features/ToDoTasks/ToDoTasksTable' import ToDoTasksSlice from "../features/ToDoTasks/ToDoTasksSlice"; export default function ToDoIndex() { const [categoryId, setCategoryId] = useState(); function setCategory(categoryId) { setCategoryId(categoryId); } return ( <>

setCategory(2)}>Add task:

Title

Category

Deadline (empty - no deadline)

) }
